resources.string: Perform a double-press motion with your palm facing the camera to pause music
Draw a clockwise circle with your palm facing the camera to answer calls
Draw a clockwise circle with your palm facing the camera to answer calls transferred to the tablet
Hold your hand with fingers pointing down %1$d to %2$d cm from the camera until the hand icon appears
Hold your hand with fingers pointing left %1$d to %2$d cm from the camera until the hand icon appears
Hold your hand with fingers pointing right %1$d to %2$d cm from the camera until the hand icon appears
Hold your hand with fingers pointing up %1$d to %2$d cm from the camera until the hand icon appears
Wave your hand down to scroll
Wave your hand left to play previous song
Wave your hand right to play next song
Wave your hand up to scroll
"Couldn't find apps that support conversation bubbles on this device"
When a messenger app in a floating window is hidden at the edge of the screen, show incoming messages in bubbles
Workstation mode allows you to open multiple apps in floating windows by tapping their icons on the app dock.
Press and hold, then drag to open on your tablet
Press and hold, then drag to open on your computer
Generate flashcards with key info automatically when apps are running in the background
Show key info when apps are displayed as floating windows
Show key info when apps are displayed as floating windows
Drag a floating window by its upper edge to move it around or tap to view more options
Swipe up from the bottom middle of the screen to close both apps
"Swipe up from the bottom middle of an app to close it"
Drag to switch to fullscreen mode
Drag to switch to Split screen or fullscreen mode
Drag windows to specified areas to switch between display modes
Press and hold, and then pull down the action bar of a floating window
Viewing floating windows in fullscreen mode
Drag text, images, or files between the different windows of supported apps.
Drag to copy to other apps
Press and hold the image and drag it to another app
Drag the window by its upper edge to move it around or tap there to close it
Press and hold the action bar of a floating window to drag
Drag the floating window to the corner of the screen
You can open new windows in supported apps by tapping the action bar
"Press and hold an app icon on the dock to open a new window. *This feature works with Notes, Mail, Browser, and WPS."
Press and hold, and then pull down the action bar of a notification
Close one or both windows in Split screen
Drag the corner to switch to a floating window and adjust its size
Drag windows by their corners to resize them
"Press and hold the bottom of the window, and drag it to the upper right corner. This feature works only when system navigation is set to gestures."
"Press and hold the bottom of the window, and drag it to the upper edge of the screen. This feature works only when system navigation is set to gestures."
Drag the corner to minimize an app
Drag the corner to minimize an app
"Press and hold the bottom of the window, and drag it to the upper edge of the screen. This feature works only when system navigation is set to gestures."
Swipe up from the action bar of a floating window
Press and hold a Split screen preview in Recents to create a shortcut for the combination
Create shortcuts for Split screen combinations using app dock on inner screen
Create shortcuts for Split screen combinations using app dock
Tap to open a new window
Drag to the center to open in a floating window
Press and hold to open a new window
Press and hold to open a new window
Press and hold to open a new window
Press and hold to open a new window
Press and hold the action bar and then swipe up to close
Pull down to open in a floating window
Press and hold the action bar and then quickly drag the window to the edge to minimize it
Drag inwards to open in a floating window
"Press and hold, then drag to move"
Drag to the side to switch to Split screen
To minimize the window, press and hold the top of the window, then quickly drag it to the edge of the screen
Quickly drag the app to the side of the screen to hide it
Quickly drag the window by the action bar to the edge of the screen
Quickly drag the app to side of the screen to hide it
Tap an app on the sidebar to open it in a floating window
Receive suggestions to open apps in Split screen or floating windows based on usage scenarios (e.g. while updating games or waiting for cabs)

Receive suggestions to open apps in floating windows on the outer screen and in floating windows or in Split screen on the inner screen based on usage scenarios (e.g. while updating games or waiting for cabs)
Receive suggestions to open apps in floating windows based on usage scenarios (e.g. while updating games or waiting for cabs)
Press and hold the action bar and drag into a corner
"· Press and hold, then pull down a notification to open it in a floating window. · Tap \"Floating windows\" in Recents to select apps."
"· Tap an app on the sidebar to open it in a floating window. · Drag an app to the center of the screen to open it in a floating window or to the side to use Split screen."
While using an app, drag another one from the sidebar to the center of the screen to open it in a floating window or to the side to use Split screen
Drag items out of the dock to open floating windows
Swipe from the bottom of the screen to the upper right corner
Swipe from the bottom to the upper edge of the screen
Write in any text field and convert your handwriting to text (only supported by some input methods)
Scratch out text to delete it
Write with Xiaomi Focus Pen in any text field and convert your handwriting into typed text
Use a stylus to write in the text box below
Write with Xiaomi Smart Pen in any text field and convert your handwriting into typed text
Draw a vertical line to separate characters. Repeat to join them.
Draw \"∧\" below the line of text or \"∨\" above it, then write in the space that opens
Try starting a new paragraph here
Draw \"⅃\" on a line of text to start a new paragraph
Circle or underline text to select it
"Current keyboard doesn't support \"Scribe\". You can change your preferences in Settings."
Closing floating windows or switching to fullscreen mode
Press and hold the combination and add it to Home screen
Press and hold, and then pull down the action bar of a floating window
Drag the floating window to the corner of the screen
Press and hold the action bar of a floating window to drag
Press and hold, and then pull down the action bar of a notification
Opening notifications in a floating window
Swipe up from the action bar of a floating window
Create shortcuts for Split screen combinations using app dock
Input method will be switched automatically when \"Scribe\" is turned on
Press Ctrl+Space to switch between keyboard layouts
Tap app icons on the dock to open apps in floating windows. You can toggle Workstation mode on and off in Control center.
Drag the corner to switch to a floating window and adjust its size
Drag the corner to switch to a floating window and adjust its size
Slide up from the bottom of the screen and pause to unpin this app
Press and hold the back and preview buttons to unpin this app
"Couldn't get firmware version. Connect your stylus again."
Updated stylus. Reconnect it before using it.
Swipe horizontally on inner screen with three fingers to open Split screen
Swipe horizontally with three fingers to open Split screen
This feature is restricted by your device administrator or corporate policy
